results.idea: Momentum of insider buying (1mo zscore)
results.description: Uses buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo to capture recent insider buying momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using this datafield; SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields used). Coverage is 0.7842 (>0.6) so ts_backfill not needed (SUGGESTION3). Prefer high user/alpha counts where possible (SUGGESTION4 partly applied). Confidence set to 0.62 based on established insider momentum literature.

results.idea: Short-term insider buy surge (1wk delta)
results.description: Detects sudden increases in buy/sell ratio using buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1wk ts_delta. SUGGESTION1 used single high-signal field; SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage 0.7842). SUGGESTION4 considered but userCount moderate. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Sustained insider conviction (6mo mean zscore)
results.description: Measures sustained insider buying via ts_zscore(ts_mean(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo, 90), 90). Multiple operators but single high-coverage field (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields (SUGGESTION2). Coverage high so no backfill (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Insider buy concentration adjusted by holdings
results.description: Combine buy intensity (buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_qtr) with insider holdings to weight signals. Applied SUGGESTION1 (two fields). insd1_holdings has high userCount so used (SUGGESTION4). No ts_backfill needed (coverage >0.6). Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Large-value insider trades lead (insd1_value zscore)
results.description: Uses insd1_value to highlight large transaction values. SUGGESTION1 used one strong field with decent userCount; no vector usage. insd1_value coverage 0.756 so no backfill. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Insider shares increase momentum
results.description: Uses ts_delta(insd1_shares) to find growing insider share trades. SUGGESTION1 applied; insd1_shares coverage 0.756 so no backfill. Chose simple operator for clarity. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Buy ratio vs holdings (normalized)
results.description: Normalize buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo then divide by insd1_holdings to find outsized buying relative to stake. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; both have good coverage. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Recent insider buying quantile
results.description: Cross-sectional strength via quantile on buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo. SUGGESTION1 used single popular field. No vector; coverage high. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Insider buying confirmed by trade significance
results.description: Boost buy signal when insd1_tradesignificance is high: multiply(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo, insd1_tradesignificance). SUGGESTION1 used two fields; trade significance has good userCount. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Insider price sentiment (zscore of transaction price)
results.description: ts_zscore(insd1_price) to see extreme insider transaction prices relative to history. Coverage 0.756 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: moderate userCount. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Buy-to-total spike with backfill (low userCount field preprocessed)
results.description: For buy_to_total_amount_ratio_2mo (low userCount=2) apply ts_backfill to improve coverage per SUGGESTION3, then ts_zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied; SUGGESTION4 not used due to low userCount but backfill used to mitigate. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Weighted insider returns signal
results.description: Use weighted_return_all (coverage 0.4263) but backfill per SUGGESTION3 then zscore. SUGGESTION1 limited by coverage; applied backfill. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Insider buying acceleration (ts_arg_max on 6mo)
results.description: ts_arg_max(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo, 120) finds when current is highest in lookback indicating acceleration. Coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Recent buys vs long-term (short-term / 1yr)
results.description: Compare short-term buy ratio with long term: divide(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo, buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1yr). SUGGESTION1 used two time-windows. Both coverages high. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Insider trade value velocity
results.description: ts_returns(insd1_value, 30) measures velocity of transaction values. Coverage 0.756 so no backfill. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Low-frequency insider increase (2mo zscore)
results.description: ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_2mo, 120) captures medium-term trend. Coverage high; SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Insider holdings growth signal (days_from_last_change)
results.description: days_from_last_change(insd1_holdings) to find long gaps then new activity may convey info. SUGGESTION1 used the high userCount holdings field. No backfill. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: High conviction buys normalized cross-section
results.description: zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_qtr) then cross-sectional normalize to remove market mean. SUGGESTION1 applied; coverage adequate. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Insider buying with low volatility (IR style)
results.description: ts_ir(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo, 90) to favor persistent signals with low noise. SUGGESTION1 used; coverage good. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Buy ratio momentum adjusted by trade size
results.description: Multiply buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo by insd1_value to amplify large-money buys. Both fields have good coverage and userCount. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Insider selling warning (reverse of buy ratio)
results.description: reverse(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo) to signal heavy selling pressure from insiders. SUGGESTION1 used single field. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Extreme insider trade outlier removal then zscore
results.description: winsorize(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo, std=3) then ts_zscore to reduce outliers. SUGGESTION1 applied; used winsorize to improve robustness per KEEP_IN_MIND1. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Insider trade frequency signal (ts_count_nans inverse)
results.description: Use ts_count_nans(insd1_holdings, 60) to identify infrequent reporting; reverse to favor recently active insiders. Coverage high; no backfill. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Short-term buy concentration (2wk zscore)
results.description: ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_2wk, 30) to detect concentrated recent buying. Coverage high; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Buy ratio momentum normalized by shares traded
results.description: Divide ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo) by ts_zscore(insd1_shares) to adjust for trade size. Both fields coverage high. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Insider trade Sharpe-backed momentum
results.description: Use weighted_sharpe_all (coverage 0.4263) but ts_backfill then ts_zscore to stabilize per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4 limited by low coverage but backfill applied. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Buy-to-total recent surge with significance filter
results.description: multiply(ts_zscore(buy_to_total_amount_ratio_1wk,30), insd1_tradesignificance). buy_to_total_1wk coverage OK; trade significance used to weight. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Insider transaction value per share
results.description: divide(insd1_value, insd1_shares) to get implied price then zscore. Both fields present with good coverage. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Consistent top insiders (ts_arg_min of holdings changes)
results.description: ts_arg_min(ts_delta(insd1_holdings,30), 120) to find instruments with recent biggest increases relative to history. SUGGESTION1 used holdings. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Buy ratio persistence (ts_regression slope)
results.description: ts_regression(y=buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo, x=ts_step(1), d=120, lag=0) to extract trend slope. SUGGESTION1 used powerful operator to capture persistent trend. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Insider buying prior to price move (mean_return_long backfilled)
results.description: mean_return_long has low coverage 0.3407 so ts_backfill used then ts_zscore to identify positive expected returns. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: Buy-to-sell ratio divergence (1mo vs qtr)
results.description: subtract(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo, buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_qtr) to find acceleration. Both fields coverage high. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: High-value buys relative to holdings
results.description: divide(insd1_valueeur, insd1_holdings) to find large value increases per holding unit; zscore afterwards. Both fields coverage >0.6. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Insider buys with declining variability (low vec_std proxy using ts_std_dev)
results.description: Use ts_std_dev(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo, 90) and reverse it to favor stable buy signals. Suggestion2 not applicable. Coverage high. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Recent top insider buy days (ts_arg_max 30)
results.description: ts_arg_max(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo, 30) to find if today is recent max. Coverage good. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Insider buy ratio scaled to historical range
results.description: ts_scale(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo, 180) to map into 0-1 range for easier combination. Coverage high; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Insider selling acceleration (negative delta)
results.description: reverse(ts_delta(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo, 20)) to highlight accelerating selling. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Cross-window confirmation (1wk and 1mo both high)
results.description: min(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1wk,30), ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60)) to require agreement. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Insider transaction price anomaly (price vs implied)
results.description: subtract(insd1_price, divide(insd1_value, insd1_shares)) then ts_zscore to find price anomalies. Both fields coverage good. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Persistent buyer IR (ts_ir on buy_to_total 6mo)
results.description: ts_ir(buy_to_total_amount_ratio_6mo, 180) to find persistent buy-to-total signals. Field coverage 0.7842. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Insider trade concentration by value (vec proxy with ts_sum)
results.description: ts_sum(insd1_value, 30) to approximate concentration of recent insider value. No vector fields; used ts_sum per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Backfilled checkpoint return signal
results.description: txn_return_mean_checkpoint coverage 0.4488 so ts_backfill applied, then ts_zscore to extract signal. SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: High-significance long returns (txn_return_long_checkpoint)
results.description: txn_return_long_checkpoint has coverage 0.4488; backfilled then ts_rank to create ordinal signal. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Insider buying vs average returns
results.description: Compare buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo with mean_return_all (low coverage) using ts_backfill for mean_return_all, then subtract. SUGGESTION3 applied for low coverage. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Trade size spike relative to historical mean
results.description: ts_av_diff(insd1_shares, 90) finds today's deviation from recent mean. Coverage OK. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Insider buy-to-sell rapid increase (ts_max_diff)
results.description: ts_max_diff(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo, 60) to find how far below max current is (reverse if needed). Coverage good. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Robust buy signal via winsorize + quantile
results.description: winsorize(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo,2) then quantile to create robust cross-sectional rank. Coverage high; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Insider buying with low historical kurtosis
results.description: ts_kurtosis(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1yr, 260) and reverse to favor stable distributions. No vector fields; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Buy ratio normalized to recent extremes
results.description: ts_scale(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo, 90) then zscore for cross-sectional use. Coverage high. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Insider buying corroborated by weighted Sharpe
results.description: Combine buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_qtr with weighted_sharpe_all (low coverage, backfill applied) via multiply. SUGGESTION3 used for weighted_sharpe_all. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Short-term buy spikes confirmed by trade significance and shares
results.description: multiply(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1wk,30), multiply(insd1_tradesignificance, ts_zscore(insd1_shares,60))) uses three operators and two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Backfilled checkpoint sharpe signal
results.description: txn_sharpe_ratio_checkpoint coverage 0.4488 so ts_backfill then ts_zscore. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.42.

results.idea: Insider buys scaled by instrument volatility
results.description: divide(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo,90), ts_std_dev(insd1_value,90)) to reduce noisy large-value trades. Both fields coverage >0.6. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Recent insider buying relative to annual trend
results.description: subtract(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,30), ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1yr,360)) to detect acceleration beyond yearly trend. SUGGESTION1 used two windows. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Insider price stability signal
results.description: reverse(ts_std_dev(insd1_price,90)) to favor insiders transacting at stable prices. Coverage high. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Buy-to-total ratio cross-window min confirmation
results.description: min(ts_zscore(buy_to_total_amount_ratio_1mo,60), ts_zscore(buy_to_total_amount_ratio_qtr,120)) to require consistency. Both fields coverage decent. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Insider trades per currency (currency-coded grouping proxy using transaction_currency_code not used directly)
results.description: transaction_currency_code is non-numeric and low userCount so not used directly (KEEP_IN_MIND3). Instead use insd1_value normalized. SUGGESTION1 applied with available numeric fields. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Insider trades mean return stability
results.description: ts_std_dev(ts_backfill(txn_return_variance_checkpoint,120), 120) then reverse to favor stable return variance. Applied backfill for coverage <0.6 per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Buy momentum adjusted by checkpoint days
results.description: divide(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60), ts_backfill(txn_days_checkpoint,120))—txn_days_checkpoint low coverage so backfilled per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Insider activity breadth (number of transactions proxy)
results.description: Use ts_sum(isnan(insd1_shares)==0 over 30 days) but since is_nan operator exists, implement as reverse(ts_count_nans(insd1_shares,30)) to approximate activity breadth. Coverage high. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: High conviction buys using arg_max across windows
results.description: min(ts_arg_max(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1wk,30), ts_arg_max(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60)) to find instruments at local maxima across windows. SUGGESTION1 used multiple windows. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Insider trade noise-adjusted buy signal
results.description: divide(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo,90), ts_std_dev(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo,90)) to favor stable signals. Single field used; SUGGESTION1 partially applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Insider holdings per transaction value
results.description: divide(insd1_holdings, insd1_value) to find holdings impact per transaction size then zscore. Both fields high coverage. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Buy ratio variability (ts_av_diff relative)
results.description: ts_av_diff(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_qtr, 90) to find deviations from 90-day mean. Coverage >0.6. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Insider buys confirmed by max trade price
results.description: Use max_trade_price (low userCount=8) cautiously; ts_backfill applied before ts_zscore per SUGGESTION3. However limited alphaCount so confidence lower. Confidence 0.38.

results.idea: Insider-derived expected return (weighted_return_all backfilled zscore)
results.description: weighted_return_all coverage 0.4263 so ts_backfill then ts_zscore. SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Buy-to-sell ratio seasonality check (ts_arg_min 365)
results.description: ts_arg_min(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1yr, 365) to test if current is seasonal low (reverse to prefer highs). Coverage high. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Insider trade value per share velocity
results.description: ts_delta(divide(insd1_value, insd1_shares), 30) to measure changes in implied transaction price velocity. Both fields available. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Consistent positive transaction sharpe (txn_sharpe_long_checkpoint)
results.description: txn_sharpe_long_checkpoint coverage 0.4488 so ts_backfill then quantile to rank. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: Insider trade value concentration vs shares (scale)
results.description: divide(ts_scale(insd1_value,90), ts_scale(insd1_shares,90)) to find value-heavy trades. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Recent insider buying with low checkpoint variance
results.description: multiply(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60), reverse(ts_zscore(ts_backfill(txn_return_variance_checkpoint,120),60))) uses backfill for low coverage field and combines with buy ratio. SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Insider buy-to-total high-quantile filter
results.description: quantile(buy_to_total_amount_ratio_qtr) to select top cross-sectional buyers. Coverage good. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Long-term buy consensus (avg of multiple windows)
results.description: divide(add(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1yr, buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo), 2) to smooth signals across long windows. SUGGESTION1 applied with two fields. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Insider shares surge normalized
results.description: zscore(ts_delta(insd1_shares, 30)) to find unusual share transaction spikes. Coverage high. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Buy ratio vs weighted sharpe (confirm persistent alpha)
results.description: multiply(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo,90), ts_zscore(ts_backfill(weighted_sharpe_all,180),90)). Weighted sharpe backfilled per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Insider buying with low transaction count volatility
results.description: reverse(ts_std_dev(ts_count_nans(insd1_shares,90),90)) to favor steady reporting with new positive activity. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Buy-to-sell ratio momentum filtered by trade significance
results.description: if_else(greater(insd1_tradesignificance,2), ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60), NaN) to only trade when significance is high. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Insider transaction mean return adjusted (backfilled)
results.description: ts_zscore(ts_backfill(mean_return_all,180), 90) — backfill used for low coverage field per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Spike in buy-to-total relative to quarterly mean
results.description: ts_delta(buy_to_total_amount_ratio_qtr, 60) to detect spikes relative to quarter mean. Coverage high. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Insider activity momentum combined (sum of signals)
results.description: add(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60), ts_zscore(divide(insd1_value, insd1_shares),60)) to combine buy intensity and implied price momentum. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Insider sell pressure (low buy_to_total ratio)
results.description: reverse(buy_to_total_amount_ratio_1mo) to detect strong selling pressure. Single high-coverage field used. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Insider large-share transactions zscore
results.description: ts_zscore(insd1_shares, 60) to highlight unusually large share trades by insiders. Coverage good. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Buy ratio consistency (ts_rank of rolling zscore)
results.description: ts_rank(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo,90), 120) to identify consistently high scorers. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Checkpoint returns scaled by trade value
results.description: multiply(ts_backfill(txn_return_mean_checkpoint,120), ts_backfill(txn_amount_checkpoint,120)) to favor checkpoint returns supported by value. Both low coverage so backfilled per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.42.

results.idea: Insider buy-to-sell normalized to 1yr range
results.description: ts_scale(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1yr, 360) to map 1yr into 0-1 and detect extremes. Coverage high. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Insider signal de-noised by zscore of ts_mean
results.description: ts_zscore(ts_mean(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo,90),90) to favor sustained elevation over noise. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Insider buy intensity per holding change
results.description: divide(ts_delta(insd1_holdings,60), ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_qtr,90)) to find holdings changing faster than buy intensity suggests. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Backfilled transaction direction indicator filter
results.description: txn_di_checkpoint coverage 0.4488 so ts_backfill then if_else(equal(ts_backfill(txn_di_checkpoint,120), 1), ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60), NaN). SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.41.

results.idea: Insider value momentum normalized by instrument mean
results.description: divide(ts_zscore(insd1_value,90), ts_zscore(ts_mean(insd1_value,180),180)) to find anomalous current value relative to longer mean. Coverage high. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Low-turnover insider buys (hump-limited changes)
results.description: hump(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo,90), hump=0.01) to limit turnover and emphasize persistent signals. SUGGESTION1 applied and hump used for turnover control. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Insider buy ratio momentum weighted by holdings zscore
results.description: multiply(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60), ts_zscore(insd1_holdings,60)) to emphasize buys by large holders. Both fields high coverage. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Insider trade value kurtosis filter
results.description: ts_kurtosis(insd1_value, 120) and reverse to prefer low-kurtosis (stable) value trades. Coverage OK. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Cross-time consistency via product of zscores
results.description: multiply(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1wk,30), ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60)) to require both short and very short signals. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Insider implied price momentum vs market (using insd1_price)
results.description: ts_returns(insd1_price,30) to capture insiders transacting at accelerating prices. Coverage good. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Buy-to-sell range expansion (ts_max - ts_min proxy via ts_range using ts_max and ts_min not available; use ts_std_dev)
results.description: ts_std_dev(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo,90) to approximate range/expansion and reverse to favor expanding buy pressure. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Insider holdings stability filter for buys
results.description: multiply(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60), reverse(ts_std_dev(insd1_holdings,120))) to favor buys by stable holders. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Insider transaction value per day momentum
results.description: ts_product(insd1_value, 7) then ts_zscore to capture sustained value over week. Product can highlight consistent value trades. Coverage good. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Buy-to-sell local rank within quarter
results.description: grouping fields unavailable (KEEP_IN_MIND3), so use ts_rank(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_qtr,90) to get local temporal rank. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Insider trades confirmed by checkpoint sharpe (backfilled)
results.description: if txn_sharpe_ratio_checkpoint has low coverage (0.4488) backfill and require >0 using if_else, then use buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo: if_else(greater(ts_backfill(txn_sharpe_ratio_checkpoint,180),0), ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60), NaN). SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Insider value surge relative to historical sum
results.description: divide(insd1_value, ts_sum(insd1_value, 180)) then ts_zscore to detect recent concentration. Fields coverage >0.6. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Buy momentum tempered by transaction variance
results.description: divide(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo,90), ts_zscore(ts_backfill(txn_return_variance_checkpoint,120),90)) to reduce noisy checkpoint signals; backfill applied. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Insider buying relative to average position returns
results.description: subtract(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60), ts_zscore(ts_backfill(mean_return_long,180),90)) to detect buys outperforming average long returns; backfill used for mean_return_long. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Consistent top buyers via cumulative sum
results.description: ts_sum(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60), 120) to accumulate recent strength. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Insider trading anomaly: high value, low shares
results.description: if divide(insd1_value, insd1_shares) is high (zscore), flag as anomalous high-value low-share trades. Implementation uses zscore(divide(...)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Buy-to-sell long-term dispersion filter
results.description: reverse(ts_std_dev(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1yr, 360)) to favor stable long-term buy pressure. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Insider buys weighted by transaction currency (proxy by valueeur)
results.description: Use insd1_valueeur where currency normalization matters; ts_zscore(insd1_valueeur,90). SUGGESTION1 applied; transaction_currency_code not used directly due to non-numeric limitations. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Backfilled inexperienced fields combined (txn_amount_checkpoint * txn_return_mean_checkpoint)
results.description: Both checkpoint fields coverage <0.6; backfill each per SUGGESTION3 then multiply to emphasize meaningful checkpoints. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Insider buying abruptness (last_diff_value of holdings)
results.description: last_diff_value(insd1_holdings, 120) to find last change magnitude compared to current. Coverage high; SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Insider buy ratio cross-validated with checkpoint return zscore
results.description: multiply(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60), ts_zscore(ts_backfill(txn_return_mean_checkpoint,120),60)) applying backfill to low coverage checkpoint. SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Insider trade implied liquidity (value / price)
results.description: divide(insd1_value, insd1_price) then ts_zscore to detect high implied liquidity trades. Both fields coverage >0.6. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Buy-to-sell momentum trimmed by winsorize
results.description: ts_zscore(winsorize(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo, 2), 60) to reduce outlier effects then measure momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Insider trading trend robustness (ts_quantile of 6mo)
results.description: ts_quantile(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo,120) to map to a distributional score highlighting robust movers. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Insider holdings change corroborated by trade significance
results.description: multiply(ts_zscore(ts_delta(insd1_holdings,60),60), insd1_tradesignificance) to prioritize meaningful changes. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Insider price vs 6mo buy ratio divergence
results.description: subtract(ts_zscore(insd1_price,60), ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_6mo,90)) to find price moves not backed by insider buying. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Short-term buy spike with holdings confirmation
results.description: if_else(greater(ts_zscore(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_2wk,30),1), ts_zscore(insd1_holdings,60), NaN) to act only when holdings also elevated. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Insider transaction Sharpe to filter high-quality trades
results.description: txn_sharpe_short_checkpoint coverage 0.4488 so ts_backfill then quantile to rank. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Buy ratio acceleration via ts_arg_max difference
results.description: subtract(ts_arg_max(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_1mo,60), ts_arg_max(buy_to_sell_amount_ratio_qtr,120)) to find faster acceleration in shorter window. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.
